forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 4am. Mostly cloudy. Low around -2, with temperatures rising to around 4 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -13. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob red and blue loop has 18” of hard packed base . Looks like we will be skiing late into the Spring!

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Plenty of snow in woods and on golf course, woods was nicer, less wind. Trail was soft, easy climbing but not much speed on downhills. Only classic tracks were skier produced; it would be nice if the foot traffic would stop walking in the ski tracks.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Once the crew at Huron Meadows rolled the trails, it was a little on the soft side but much better than the half a foot of fresh snow that Mike made me ski in on the contractors loop.  Conditions should firm up and be quite good the next few days if you can brave the cold!  Thanks HM crew!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It just keeps snowing. Yesterday the accumulation happened in waves throughout the day and then all at once during night skiing. These lake effect bands are highly localized and Nub's has been getting the goods all week long. The majority of all of this snow is now groomed in and will make for excellent conditions today. The soup of the day is kielbasa and cabbage. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
